snippet: Can Bill Clinton reignite the flame on Wall Street for President Obama? The former president has agreed to join Mr. Obama at a series of campaign fund-raisers, including one in New York that will be attended by donors in finance, Jeffrey McCracken...
abstract: Can Bill Clinton reignite the flame on Wall Street for President Obama? The former president has agreed to join Mr. Obama at a series of campaign fund-raisers, including one in New York that will be attended by donors in finance, Jeffrey McCracken and Hans Nichols of Bloomberg News report.

headline.main: Bill Clinton to Make Wall Street Push for Obama
